title: why did my post get deleted?
body:
Helloi, i am wondering why my post got deleted without any explanation what went wrong? Is it wrong to suggest something cool wrong nowdays?

Thanks for answear!

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/t5bT71Jj-how-would-you-approve-this-idea-animation-of-casted-skills-increased-on-ground

replies.body: You should have gotten a notification with some sort of explanation in the upper left corner beside your profile. After looking over that post, it looks like it was probably deleted since it wasn't posted in the best section for the topic. Your ideas are best posted under [**Gameplay **](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)so that you can get more feedback from the community!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=f8RA9ThT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-07-15T21:46:34.281+0000)
>
> You should have gotten a notification with some sort of explanation in the upper left corner beside your profile. After looking over that post, it looks like it was probably deleted since it wasn't posted in the best section for the topic. Your ideas are best posted under [**Gameplay **](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)so that you can get more feedback from the community!

thanks for replay :)
Posted in the wrong section maybe, which was boards feedback.
